block.p: ZAHAVY-Edith. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Edith Zahavy, beloved wife of Rabbi Zev Zahavy, former Rabbi of Congregation Zichron Ephraim, mother of Dr. Tzvee and Bernice Zahavy, Dr. Miryam and Israel Wahrman, and Prof. Reuvain Zahavy. Deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President

Deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President
